TopicTitle: Apollo Mission Recreation (And More!) [Requesting Ground Crew Aid!]

Articles.Content:
As far as the debate between kerman verses kerbal, I was always told that Kermen are the correct name of the beings we so love to torture. From the KSP wikki: [URL="http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerman"]http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerman[/URL] So, until the debate is settled, Kermankind it will remain... (unless told to change it) :D

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/yPqNmSM.png?1[/IMG][/CENTER]

[quote name='Sampa']it was only fitting from what you mentioned..[/QUOTE]

I was referring to the [B][I]crew!!![/I][/B] Not kerbalized Scott!!
(btw anyone got a link to that mod?)

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='adsii1970']As far as the debate between kerman verses kerbal, I was always told that Kermen are the correct name of the beings we so love to torture. From the KSP wikki: [URL="http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerman"]http://wiki.kerbalspaceprogram.com/wiki/Kerman[/URL] So, until the debate is settled, Kermenkind it will remain... (unless told to change it) :D

[CENTER][url]http://i.imgur.com/yPqNmSM.png?1[/url][/CENTER][/QUOTE]

For the love of Jeb...

Kerman is the [I]family[/I] name. Kerbal is the [I]race[/I] name. They are not Kerbins, they are not Kermans (unless referring as a family), they are Kerbals.

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']I was referring to the [B][I]crew!!![/I][/B] Not kerbalized Scott!!

For the love of Jeb...

Kerman is the [I]family[/I] name. Kerbal is the [I]race[/I] name. They are not Kerbins, they are not Kermans (unless referring as a family), they are Kerbals.[/QUOTE]

According to the wikki, kerman can also refer to the species... :cool:

[quote name='adsii1970']According to the wikki, kerman can also refer to the species... :cool:[/QUOTE]

The wiki is a public information source which can be freely editted by anybody which can lead to falsified sources. So I'm going to stick with the devs term for them, which is the race is Kerbals and the family name is Kerman.
This would be so awesome...
must be a huge family! Would hate to be the host of a Thanksgiving Day get together for that family! :P

[quote name='Avera9eJoe']This would be so awesome...[/QUOTE]

It would be more awesome if you'd advertise this or even join us! More help the better :) .

[COLOR="silver"][SIZE=1]- - - Updated - - -[/SIZE][/COLOR]

[quote name='Sampa']must be a huge family! Would hate to be the host of a Thanksgiving Day get together for that family! :P[/QUOTE]

That's the only issue with Kerbals... For a long time we assumed Kerbals were asexual and that's why they all had the same last name (would make more sense since there was only one gender which we just assumed was male). But now that Kerbals are a bisexual race (meaning there are two sexes or genders), it more confusing!

Game suggestion! MORE LAST NAMES!!

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']The wiki is a public information source which can be freely editted by anybody which can lead to falsified sources. So I'm going to stick with the devs term for them, which is the race is Kerbals and the family name is Kerman.[/QUOTE]

So... here's the final revised draft. I was actually giving you a hard time because a while back ago, I was JUMPED on by someone for making the mistake. I was told that Kerbal is not correct, that Kerman was correct... getting to the point I DON'T CARE what they are called... :huh: Not being a bad sport, but think that we ought to keep in mind this is NOT a matter of life or death...

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/SAc6dAP.png?1[/IMG][/CENTER]

Unless there are other corrections, is this the final draft that meets everyone's approval?

[quote name='ZooNamedGames']
That's the only issue with Kerbals... For a long time we assumed Kerbals were asexual and that's why they all had the same last name (would make more sense since there was only one gender which we just assumed was male). But now that Kerbals are a bisexual race (meaning there are two sexes or genders), it more confusing!

Game suggestion! MORE LAST NAMES!![/QUOTE]

Ok, sounds good to me. Now since we have the PROGRAM patch, here is the first mission patch based on this design. As long as names are not too long, they can be added to this patch.

[CENTER][IMG]http://i.imgur.com/HBc5L0J.png?1[/IMG] [IMG]http://i.imgur.com/POlRfa3.png?1[/IMG][/CENTER]

And here are a few of the goodies I mentioned in a previous post in this thread:

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/GpleGoS.png?1[/IMG] For those who are members of the Flight Crew. (The patch area can be changed to represent current mission patch)

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/BHEeYC5.png?1[/IMG] For those who are members of Mission Control.

[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/fOCsCJu.png?1[/IMG] For those (I believe I saw one) who is part of the promotional team.
